short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A cutting-edge self-custodial web3 wallet for the Xian Network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage Your Cryptocurrency Securely with the Xian Wallet - Xian Wallet is a pioneering, serverless web extension designed for optimal security in managing your cryptocurrency wallets and generating cryptographic keypairs for use with the Xian network.

Key Features:

Wallet Management: Enjoy a seamless interface for sending, receiving, and managing cryptocurrency transactions directly from your browser.

Integrated Development Environment (IDE): Create, deploy, and interact with smart contracts on the Xian Network with ease.

Secure Key Management: Generate and manage Xian keypairs with state-of-the-art encryption techniques, ensuring your keys are safe and secure.

Xian Wallet conducts all cryptographic functions client-side to guarantee that private keys never leave your device.
